system.description: Your exceptional awareness allows you to identify and exploit weak points in your targets, turning good hits into devastating strikes.
system.benefit: When the character hits with a ranged attack, they can make a +0 Perception Test as a Reaction. If successful, they add the Degrees of Success from the Perception Test to the original Ballistic Test for the attack.

rollConfig.description: Perception Test as Reaction to add DoS to attack

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Critical
specialAbilities.description: When you hit with a ranged attack, make a Perception Test as a Reaction. Add the DoS from Perception to your attack's DoS.
